definition: to go on a hunting expedition

sentences.english: Humans lived as roaming hunters and gatherers for most of their existence.
sentences.chinese: 當時的人類羣體絕大部分是以遊獵部落形式存在的。

sentences.english: A big-game hunter went on safari with his wife and mother-in-law.
sentences.chinese: 一位職業獵人帶着妻子和岳母一塊去遊獵。

sentences.english: These trips are called balloon safaris.
sentences.chinese: 這種旅行被稱爲氣球遊獵。

sentences.english: Burdick admitted that the safaris were just a hoax.
sentences.chinese: 迪克承認遊獵玩意只是騙局。

sentences.english: The Waorani are a semi-nomadic people who hunt to feed themselves.
sentences.chinese: Waorani人是半遊牧民族，以遊獵爲生。

definition: Liuying township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
the State of Qǐ in modern Qǐ county 杞縣|杞县, Henan (c. 1500-445 BC), a small vassal state of Shang and Western Zhou for most of its existence
Zou Yan (305-240 BC), founder of the School of Yin-Yang of the Warring States Period (475-221 BC)
lit. morning bell, evening drum, symbolizing monastic practice (idiom); fig. encouragement to study or progress
Yang Jiong (650-693?), one of the Four Great Poets of the Early Tang 初唐四傑|初唐四杰[Chu1 Tang2 Si4 jie2]
